array.name: angle
array.item: The amount of turn between two lines that meet at a common point (vertex).

array.name: measured
array.item: An angle for which the measurement in degrees or radians is known.

array.name: spherical
array.item: An angle formed by intersecting arcs on a spheres surface.

array.name: right
array.item: An angle that measures 90 degrees, forming an "L" shape.

array.name: degree
array.item: A unit of measurement for angles, where a full circle is divided into 360 degrees.

array.name: degrees
array.item: The symbol used to represent degrees.

array.name: primes
array.item: A symbol used to represent minutes in angles, where 1 degree equals 60 minutes.

array.name: doubleprime
array.item: A symbol used to represent seconds in angles, where 1 minute equals 60 seconds.

array.name: line
array.item: A straight path that extends infinitely in both directions.

array.name: linesegment
array.item: A part of a line with two endpoints.

array.name: ray
array.item: A portion of a line that starts at a point (the endpoint) and extends infinitely in one direction.

array.name: arc
array.item: A part of the circumference of a circle, typically measured in degrees.

array.name: perpendicular
array.item: Lines or segments that meet at right angles.

array.name: parallel
array.item: Lines that will never intersect, no matter how far they extend.

array.name: congruentto
array.item: Two shapes or objects that have the same size and shape.

array.name: similarity
array.item: Two shapes that have the same shape but possibly different sizes.

array.name: triangle
array.item: A polygon with three sides and three angles.

array.name: distance
array.item: The length of the shortest path between two points.

array.name: piconstant
array.item: A mathematical constant approximately equal to 3.14159, often used in

array.name: radians
array.item: A unit of measurement for angles where the angle is measured in relation to the radius of a circle.

array.name: rad
array.item: The symbol used to represent radians.

array.name: gradians
array.item: A unit of measurement for angles where a full circle is divided into 400 gradians or gons.
